storyInfo:
The people of Dahuang demonstrate unshakable unity and resolve to protect their homes.
Perhaps because of a deep connection to this land, a vague consciousness reconstitutes amidst the chaos.

attributes.content: Uncle?
attributes.name: Grain Buds

attributes.content: Mute Uncle? Where are you?
attributes.name: Grain Buds

attributes.content: Don't try to fight those monsters, okay? Come out already, and let's get out of here together!
attributes.name: Grain Buds

attributes.content: (Piercing wail)
attributes.name: Eerie Fabric

attributes.content: He is immersed in his own battlefield.
The enemies he faces are unspeakable, his tongue rigid and dead inside his mouth.
The people he loved have already left, never to see the next spring.
He lifts his weapon high into the air. All he feels is that he has something he must protect.
But... what is it?
The sound of a flute slowly drifts in.
(Plays flute laboriously)
attributes.name: Grain Buds

attributes.content: Uncle! Uncle! I'm right here! Hurry! Don't stay in the forest!
attributes.name: Grain Buds

attributes.content: Let's get out of here together! Let's go home!
attributes.name: Grain Buds

attributes.content: (Howls)
attributes.name: Eerie Fabric

attributes.content: You think I'm scared of you! Get lost, you ugly thing! Gun kai!
attributes.name: Grain Buds

attributes.content: ...Urgh!
attributes.name: Grain Buds

attributes.content: A long axe lodges itself in the chest of the strange monster. It struggles to get up, but at least, the silk strands fall apart and disperse onto the ground.

Long after the axe had been released, the lumberjack's hands remain fixed in the motion of throwing his weapon. Unable to see clearly, he lowers his head and turns his ears, carefully listening to the sounds around him.
There you are, Uncle! Finally found you!
attributes.name: Grain Buds

attributes.content: I'm over here! Hurry, come on over! I'll take you to safety!
attributes.name: Grain Buds

attributes.content: The lumberjack continues to listen carefully, and looks toward Grain Buds.
He then picks up his axe again, and turns to head deeper into the woods.
Uncle? Uncle! It's dangerous over there! You need to turn back!
attributes.name: Grain Buds

attributes.content: Grain Buds brings her flute to her lips again, tries hard to steady her breathing, and begins to play another song.
The flowers have bloomed, so hurry on home~♪
Listen, listen, 'tis I who calls you back~♪
But, the lumberjack does not stop. Several monsters lie prone in the grass in front of Grain Buds.
His cloudy eyes are unable to discern the things in front of him, the world spinning endlessly before his eyes. The blood in his veins roars, drowning out all other sound.
Until a sharp cry pierces his ears like a needle.
Aaagh!
attributes.name: Grain Buds

attributes.content: Grain Buds turns to try to run, but then she raises her flute again, and a sharper sound reaches his ears.
The flowers have bloomed, so hurry on home~♪
Listen, listen, 'tis I who calls you back~♪
(...The flowers have bloomed, and it's time to come home...)
attributes.name: Silent Lumberjack

attributes.content: He takes a step forward.
A tiny white finger is holding his hand.
Uncle, let's go... You don't know how to get back, do you?
attributes.name: Grain Buds

attributes.content: Why don't you want to go back? Are you afraid you'll scare the others?
attributes.name: Grain Buds

attributes.content: I promise, nobody's going to be afraid of you anymore. They won't treat you like a freak... If anyone tries to badmouth you again, I'll bonk them on the head with my flute!
attributes.name: Grain Buds

attributes.content: So, let's go back together, okay...?
attributes.name: Grain Buds

attributes.content: The red silk tied to his arm suddenly loosens and is blown away by the wind, floating lazily into the sky.
Large teardrops roll from the lumberjack's cloudy eyes, but Grain Buds does not notice.
Run, Uncle––
attributes.name: Grain Buds

attributes.content: How many more... Is there really no end to these monsters?
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: All we can do is try our best to block them here...
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: How is it possible... to stop them from being afraid...?
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: Who's ever seen a battle like this before...?
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: A vast field sprawls in front of him, countless terrifying-looking monsters continuing to sprout from the ground.
Behind those two, a large number of people queue up in a long line and march slowly toward the city's center.
Cries erupt from the team. The Tumu Tianshis barely manage to erect a defensive line with their Originium Arts, standing between the people and the monsters.
The ground beneath their feet shakes, and a few more cries burst from the crowd.
What happened?
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: The plate was just disconnected from the core city.
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: Control of the various soil parameters in the experimental plate depend on the core city's power supply... Now that it's been cut off, the field will become fallow.
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: Xiao bie du zi! Where did these damned monsters come from? All our years of hard work, ruined because of you!
attributes.name: Resentful Farmer

attributes.content: I've never been wronged like this in all my years here!
attributes.name: Resentful Farmer

attributes.content: Damn right! Why the hell should we run from these?
attributes.name: Angry Farmer

attributes.content: These beasts want to destroy our land and swallow up our crops, so we're gonna fight 'em to the very end!
attributes.name: Angry Farmer

attributes.content: Come on, let's take the fight to them!
attributes.name: Angry Farmer

attributes.content: Be careful, everyone...
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Someone picks up a hoe left in the field, and turns to rush at an unknown monster. The hoe falls heavily upon the monster's head, causing the creature to stagger.
The farmers desperately pick up whatever objects lie at their disposal, throwing stones and farm tools at the monster.
A haphazardly-tossed bottle of pesticide shatters against it, causing the monster to whimper.
(Pained howl)
attributes.name: Eerie Fabric

attributes.content: It's... working?
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: It's... It's dead...?
attributes.name: Alarmed Farmer

attributes.content: It's working! We did it!
attributes.name: Excited Farmer

attributes.content: I get it now! These things were transformed from the pests in the field!
attributes.name: Excited Farmer

attributes.content: Ma le ge ba zi! They're not monsters at all!
attributes.name: Excited Farmer

attributes.content: Nothing to be scared of! Gather up, and let's get rid of the beasts messin' with our crops!
attributes.name: Excited Farmer

attributes.content: Others answer the call, more and more people picking up whatever tools they can get their hands on and joining the defensive line. Some even sing at the top of their lungs.

attributes.text: Let the wild plains, rivers and mountains come! Harsh is the east wind, the frozen moon, heavens fickle, raging thunder♪
May the scent of rice fill Heaven and earth, north and south, and fear neither drought nor flood! If only I was the wind and spring rain, bringing spring to the people♪

attributes.content: ...*cough* *cough*...!
attributes.name: Silent Lumberjack

attributes.content: Uncle, don't stop here! A few more steps, and we'll be there!
attributes.name: Grain Buds

attributes.content: (Shrill howl)
attributes.name: Eerie Fabric

attributes.content: Arrrgh–-! Outta the way! Outta the way!!
attributes.name: Grain Buds

attributes.content: Urgh...!
attributes.name: Grain Buds

attributes.content: Uncle! What's wrong... Ugh, you need pressure on your wound!
attributes.name: Grain Buds

attributes.content: Don't worry, it'll be okay. We're almost there! I've carried injured burdenbeasts home before, and you don't look any heavier than them. Trust me, I can take you back!
attributes.name: Grain Buds

attributes.content: All of you... get out of my way! Gun kai!
attributes.name: Grain Buds

attributes.content: Stay away!
attributes.name: Grain Buds

attributes.content: Stay away... from––
attributes.name: Grain Buds

attributes.content: Her tiny body falls to the ground, the sound ringing in the lumberjack's ears. He braces himself and lifts his weapon again.
(Pants heavily)
attributes.name: Silent Lumberjack

attributes.content: Uaaaaargh––!!
attributes.name: Silent Lumberjack

attributes.content: Halt.
attributes.name: Serious Apprentice Tianshi?

attributes.content: Zu... Zushi...
attributes.name: Silent Lumberjack

attributes.content: Alright, come on down.
attributes.name: 'Old Tianshi'

attributes.content: Your mind has already reached its limit. Stand down. I don't want to have to kill another apprentice with my own two hands.
attributes.name: 'Old Tianshi'

attributes.content: Go back. There's a clever young lady waiting out there. We can't let her go without her parents.
attributes.name: 'Old Tianshi'

attributes.content: Even if she'll never recognize you again.
attributes.name: 'Old Tianshi'

attributes.content: (Breathes feebly)
attributes.name: Grain Buds

attributes.content: It's been difficult for all of you...
attributes.name: 'Old Tianshi'

attributes.content: I thought I'd head back to Dahuang to recover from my injuries, but imagine running into something like this... You'd better hope I don't get my hands on you, needle prick.
attributes.name: 'Old Tianshi'

attributes.content: The golden eccentric looks around and reaches for her belt.
Where's my fan...?
attributes.name: 'Old Tianshi'

attributes.content: The strange fabric seems aware of the danger and hesitates, not daring to draw closer.
My sorry disciples even asked how I'm not scared of these things.
attributes.name: 'Old Tianshi'

attributes.content: I flipped the question around: after killing so many of them, why are these things not afraid of me?
attributes.name: 'Old Tianshi'

attributes.content: (Terrified wail)
attributes.name: Eerie Fabric

attributes.content: A billowing current of air sweeps up, the Tianshi's golden figure uplifting light and heat into a spatial distortion, incandescent white flames outlining the chasm in the wilderness.
She snaps her fingers lightly.

attributes.text: <color=#000000>Long has she walked among us, countless demons has she subdued.</color>

attributes.content: Grow, flax, mulberry and fields, grow as the sun rises...
attributes.name: Ji

attributes.content: Drive away all evil, and bring new light to Heaven and earth...
attributes.name: Ji

attributes.content: Lalala... lalala...
attributes.name: Ji

attributes.content: The cocoon has formed...
attributes.name: Ji

attributes.content: It is time to weave.
attributes.name: Ji

attributes.content: A fowlbeast flies by.
In a domain not meant for fowlbeasts. In this place, the sun, the moon, the stars, the wind, the frost, the rain, the snow, the mountains, the rivers—none of it is meant to exist in the first place.
But, this particular fowlbeast picks up an ear of rice, flaps its wings, and tarries on the peak of a hill.
Its heart beats, and beats, as if something is about to burst out––
A gust of wind blows by, causing the saplings to wobble.
The rivers flow without cease, the water coursing.
The mountains and rivers rise, the earth and soil rumbling.
The trees plant their roots, their shadows swaying.
As if sensing something, the fowlbeast takes flight once more with the ear of rice in its mouth, two seeds of rice falling into the boundless paddies.
Swish, swoosh... swish, swoosh––
A pair of eyes open.
...You?
attributes.name: Chaotic Voice

attributes.content: You've come back?
attributes.name: Chaotic Voice
